content: and row 58 k4 ssk k2tog k5 ssk k2tog k4 17 sts oversew this edge closed at the bottom of the foot row 59 p5 k7 p5 sew the side edges of the leg decrease and sew the cast row 60 knit on edge onto the side of the body row 61 p5 k7 p5 row 62 k3 ssk k2tog k3 ssk k2tog k3 13 sts row 63 p4 k5 p4 row 64 knit row 65 p4 k5 p4 row 66 k2 ssk k2tog k1 ssk k2tog k2 9 sts row 67 p3 k3 p3 row 68 k1 k2tog 4 times 5 sts pull through to cast off alec the alligator copyright © 2018 amanda berry page 3 of 3
